sentences.en: A similar restriction by a maker or drawer would destroy the negotiality of the instrument.
sentences.cn: 如开票人或提款人作类似限制,则票据的流通性就会遭到破坏.

sentences.en: Citizens of the EU can travel without restriction within the EU.
sentences.cn: 欧盟的公民在欧盟境内可以不受限制地出入各国.

sentences.en: If the law of parity conservation were suspended, this restriction would be removed.
sentences.cn: 如果宇称守恒定律受到破坏, 就会取消这个限制.

sentences.en: It enables a specific gene to be located on a particular restriction enzyme fragment.
sentences.cn: 它就能使专一的基因被定位于特定的限制性内切酶切成的片段上.

sentences.en: One restriction on agency action takes the form of judicial review.
sentences.cn: 对机构行为实行限制的另外一种形式表现为司法复审.

sentences.en: Some restriction on funding was necessary.
sentences.cn: 有必要对资金提供加以限制。

sentences.en: Such legislation is virtually immune from restriction under the commerce clause.
sentences.cn: 按照《商业条款》,该立法不受限制的影响.

sentences.en: The 30 mph speed restriction applies in all built - up areas.
sentences.cn: 每小时限速30英里适用于所有建筑物聚集区.

sentences.en: The gasoline detection system consists of a capillary restriction.
sentences.cn: 汽油检测系统由毛细管节流器组成.

sentences.en: The Supreme Court struck down this restriction.
sentences.cn: 最高法院撤销了这一限制.

sentences.en: The swimming club is open to families in the neighborhood without restriction.
sentences.cn: 这个游泳俱乐部对邻近地区的家庭开放,不受限制.

sentences.en: Their success is conditional, I suggest, on this restriction.
sentences.cn: 我认为他们能否成功取决于这一限制因素.

sentences.en: There is no restriction [ limit ] on the number of people.
When this restriction is removed , the body assumes the liquid states.
sentences.cn: 当这种限制不在存在时, 物体就呈液态了.

sentences.en: Worse still was the restriction of responsibility to one's own field.
sentences.cn: 更糟糕的是只准各人自扫门前雪.

words.tran_cn: 限制的；限制性的；约束的
限制（restrict的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 限制酶，限制性内切核酸酶

trans.tran_cn: 限制，限定，拘束，束缚，管制
trans.tran_en: a rule or law that limits or controls what people can do
